ComicInfo.Title: Train of Thought; Episode 2: The Party Animals
ComicInfo.Summary:
Train of Thought: Reiken takes his band of recruits back to the Siovansin and lays out his plan to take it over. Jason trains to assassinate the Avatar and is seduced by Beys.
Episode 2: The Party Animals: It is the festival of Tiench'Mein where the people bid farewell to the young warriors. Lord Shibo attacks during the festival and Ching falls off the fortress wall into the rapids below. Yu dives to the rescue.
